title: Razor (From “Norah Jones is Playing Along” Podcast)
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Dave Grohl, 
Norah Jones & Dave Grohl
]
Wake up, it's time
We need to find a better place to hide
Make up your mind
I need to know, I need to know tonight
[Chorus: Norah Jones & Dave Grohl]
Sweet and divine
Razor of mine
Sweet and divine
Razorblade shine
[Verse 2: Norah Jones & Dave Grohl]
Patience, my dear
We could spend a lifetime waitin' here
Maybe this time
I hope I get the chance to say goodbye
[Chorus: Norah Jones & Dave Grohl]
Sweet and divine
Razor of mine
Sweet and divine
Razorblade shine
[Bridge: Norah Jones & Dave Grohl]
Day after day
Cuttin' away
Day after day
But anyway

[Verse 3: Dave Grohl, 
Norah Jones & Dave Grohl
]
Wake up, it's time
We need to find a better place to hidе
Make up your mind
I need to know, I need to know tonight
[Chorus: Norah Jones & Dave Grohl]
Sweet and divine
Razor of mine
Sweet and divinе
Razorblade shine
